## Additional Mapping Annotations

### Objectives
* Specify a primary key generation strategy with the
`@GeneratedValue` annotation.

* Describe *Date* and *Calendar* values to JPA with the `@Temporal` annotation.

* Use the `@Enumerated` annotation to store enum values to your database.â€©

### Topics
*  [`@GeneratedValue`](generatedValue.md) 
*  [Temporal Data](temporal.md) 
*  [`@Enumerated`](enumerated.md) 
*  [Labs](labs.md)
